original: Bergqvist, Gustaf Ivar Johannes, civilingenjör, Norrköping, f. 31/1/04 i Stora Tuna, Kopparb. 1., av gross-handl. Gustaf B. o. Elisabeth Kullenberg. G. 40 m. Rut Wijkander. Barn: Elisabeth f. 42, Helena 44. — Stud:ex. i Örebro 22, KTH (E) 23-27, stud. v. HHS 37, genomg. ASEA elevkurs 27- 28. Föret, ett flert. res. t. de skand. länd. samt t. Tyskl., Frankr., Syd-euro’pa, RyssL, Kina, Japan, Malajstaterna, Indien o. Mindre Asien. Ing. v. ASEA fr. 28, varav v. regulatorbyrån 28-30, v. utländska o. anläggn:-avd. 30-32, h. ASEA agent Moysey & Co. Ltd i Shanghai 32-35, v. uti. avd. i Västerås 36-41, chef f. försäljn :eko-nom. byrån 41-45, chef f. ASEA filial i Norrköp. sed. 46. Hobbies: golf, fri-luftsHv.
translated: Bergqvist, Gustaf Ivar Johannes, engineer, Norrköping, b. 31/1/04 in Stora Tuna, Kopparb. county, son of wholesale merchant Gustaf B. and Elisabeth Kullenberg. Married in 1940 to Rut Wijkander. Children: Elisabeth b. 1942, Helena b. 1944. - Graduated from high school in Örebro in 1922, studied at KTH (Royal Institute of Technology) from 1923-1927, student at HHS (Handelshögskolan) in 1937, completed an ASEA (Allmänna Svenska Elektriska Aktiebolaget) apprentice program from 1927-1928. Had multiple business trips to the Scandinavian countries as well as to Germany, France, Southern Europe, Russia, China, Japan, the Malay states, India, and Asia Minor. Employed by ASEA since 1928, where he worked in the regulator office from 1928-1930, foreign and plant department from 1930-1932, as an ASEA agent for Moysey & Co. Ltd in Shanghai from 1932-1935, in the foreign department in Västerås from 1936-1941, and was the head of the sales-economic office from 1941-1945. He became the head of the ASEA branch in Norrköping in 1946. Hobbies: golf, outdoor activities.
